ygData.messageBody:
Message: 6
Date: Thu, 02 Sep 1999 09:21:06 +0200
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
Subject: Wizard AE spells in group lv 27

>Tactic: if a group pull 2 or 3 darkies i wait until they build some >hate
>against fighters and then i cast a Ligting storm on them. If casted >in
>right moment it will not make them agresive and i will do much more >damage
>then using only DD spels.

Thanks for the tips. Question....I would assume you'd need to have your
group attack each of the Mobs to get their attention eh? I would assume any
Mobs that have not been attacked would suddenly turn aggro on you if you
suddenly dropped balls of flame on their heads? :)

>Pulling with eye... Eye is nice thing to pull a mobs first they don >get
>agresive to it until it is realy near. and when they hit you can pull >only
>this room of monsters as target is already killed and they go after a

I'll give this tactic a try. Do you just let them kill the eyeball and wait
for them to find you?

Final unrelated question: I know this has been covered before, but I don't
want to dig through hundreds of digests. :) How do I find my way around the
Cazic maze from our teleport pyramid? How do I get to the courtyard?

Thanks,
-- Lim'Dul
